Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Ll-CATH (L. liui cathelicidin, UCSS1a; natural AMPs; toad, amphibians, animals; likely 3S=S)
Sequence Information.Source: the Chongâ€™an Moustache Toad,Leptobrachium liui, China, Asia

Literature.Author: Chen J, Zhang CY, Wang Y, Zhang L, Seah RWX, Ma L, Ding GH.2024
Literature.Title: Discovery of Ll-CATH: a novel cathelicidin from the Chong'an Moustache Toad (Leptobrachium liui) with antibacterial and immunomodulatory activity.

Sequence Information.Comments:
Peptide discovery: predicted cathelicidin based on sequence alingment.Host expression: mainly expressed in spleen of the toad.Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence shows low similarity (38.1%) toPhD1R: 20%, C: 17%.Activity: Active against A.hydrophila ATCC7966 (MIC >100 ug/ml), E.coli K12 (MIC > 100 ug/ml), L.monocytogenes ATCC19115 (MIC >100 ug/ml), P. mirabilis ATCC25933 (MIC 100 ug/ml), S.enterica ATCC13076 (MIC > 100 ug/ml), S. epidermidis ATCC12228 (MIC 12.5 ug/ml), S.iniae ATCC29178 (MIC > 100 ug/ml), V. harveyi ATCC33866 (MIC 25 ug/ml), V. parahaemolyticus ATCC33847 (MIC 100 ug/ml), and V. vulnifcus ATCC279562 (MIC 3.75 ug/ml). I
 Anti-inflammatory: Ll-CATH treatment decreased TNF-alpha and il-1beta expression in RAW264.7 cells (only at high concentration, to be confirmed).
